abort.install_failed: Unable to install repository. See logs for details.
abort.invalid_structure: Repository has invalid structure. See logs for details.

resource.description:
Frontend resources require URL from where to download compiled JS / CSS files when changes are detected within the repository.

Variable `version` will be replaced with the corresponding GIT repository tag / commit hash (as configured in previous step).
resource.title: Fill in resource details

data_description.type:
Integrations are `custom_components` that are not part of Home Assistant.
Repositories are frontend resources like themes, Lovelace plugins, etc.
data_description.update_strategy:
Determines which references from repository are reported as updates in Home Assistant.
Latest tag will offer the latest stable version. Latest unstable tag will offer the latest tag, even if it is a dev, alpha, beta, or RC version. Latest commit will always follow the latest commit (this is the least stable option).

init.description: Restart is required to finish {action} of `{name}`.
init.title: Restart required

options.latest_unstable_tag: Latest unstable tag (including dev, alpha, beta, RC versions)
